content:
As a language model AI, I don't have personal preferences or experiences. However, here are some general recommendations for clothing and gear visitors could bring to be comfortable during festivals and events in Barnstaple:

1. Comfortable walking shoes or sneakers, as most of the events involve a lot of walking and standing.

2. Light and breathable clothing for the summer festivals.

3. Warm clothing, such as a coat or jacket, for the winter festivals.

4. A waterproof jacket or poncho, as it can rain in Barnstaple at any time of the year.

5. A hat and sunscreen to protect from the sun during summer festivals.

6. Cash, as some events might not accept credit or debit cards.

7. A backpack or shoulder bag to carry water, snacks, and other essentials.

8. An umbrella or parasol, just in case it rains.

9. A camera or smartphone to capture the memories of the festivals and events.

10. A travel adapter or power bank to charge electronic devices.
